participant_1.background:

I love spending time with my kids, especially when we're baking together.
i have a new job selling cars.
i m the world s best aunt.
I'm cold, but I'm happy to be with my family.

i like to travel.
i have a law degree.
I sometimes like to listen to music while I drive my old car.
I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.

content.text: Hey, I'm looking for someone to go on a hike with me.
Hi, I like hiking. Where are you thinking of going?
I was thinking about going to the mountains. It's been a while since I've been hiking and I miss it.
That sounds like fun. I've never been hiking in the mountains before.
I'm sure you'd like it. It's really beautiful there.
Great. What day works best for you?
Okay. I'll pick you up at 9am. We can drive to the mountains together.
